mapper.insert: INSERT INTO note_history (note_id, title, content, version, create_time) VALUES (#{noteId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{version}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE note_history SET note_id=#{noteId}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, version=#{version}, create_time=#{createTime} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, note_id, title, content, version, create_time FROM note_history WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, note_id, title, content, version, create_time FROM note_history ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, note_id, title, content, version, create_time FROM note_history WHERE user_id=#{userId}
